DOC.brief_summary: The ICAN Pilot project aim evaluate difference economic , clinical quality life outcomes nutrition intervention involve lifestyle case management medical nutrition therapy register dietitian compare usual medical care obese person type 2 diabetes . The intervention aim moderate weight loss ( > 5-10 % ) , improvement diet quality increase physical activity .
DOC.brief_title: Lifestyle Intervention 's Impact Health Care Costs
DOC.criteria: BMI > 30 kg/m2 , calculate measure weight height . Type 2 diabetic medication diabetes . Age 20 60 year age . Have phone . Fluency reading , write comprehension English Have Qualchoice primary health insurer . Depression , BDI score > 20 Pregnancy
